title: SAD NEWS
body:
I just wanted to share with you all fellow LOL players that we lost a good player today. He was my cousin, young and healthy full of energy. Just 24 years old.
He was killed by a complete stranger with a heavy punch in his face which left him breathless and unconscious to later die.
He liked the game and I wanted to ask you to share the grief with me and his family in this dark moment. 
For all you youngsters out there, enjoy life but be careful. there are evil people around everywhere.
Thanks,

Archangel71
